thread.title: The Fisher Building, Detroit's largest piece of art, gets restoration of famed frescos
thread.title_full: The Fisher Building, Detroit's largest piece of art, gets restoration of famed frescos

author: Tanya Moutzalias | tmoutzal@mlive.com
title: The Fisher Building, Detroit's largest piece of art, gets restoration of famed frescos
text: "As stewards of this building, we carry the responsibility to return the build to its former glory as the centerpiece for the rebirth of New Center and the rest of the city."
